snippet: Since President Petro O. Poroshenko called off a cease-fire and ordered troops to end the rebellion, an entirely different Ukrainian military appeared at the front.
abstract: Ukrainian troops' success in routing pro-Russian rebels reflects what officials describe as remarkable transformation of military and security apparatus; insurgency is far from over and Ukraine still fears a war with Russia that they would lose, but its military has benefited from thousands of new volunteers, financial donations and aggressive push to repair and upgrade equipment.
lead_paragraph: Since President Petro O. Poroshenko called off a cease-fire and ordered troops to end the rebellion, an entirely different Ukrainian military appeared at the front.

headline.main: Ukraine Military Finds Its Footing Against Pro-Russian Rebels
headline.print_headline: Kiev’s Military Finds Footing Against Rebels
